v8:item.v8:content: The payment currency exchange rate multiplier.
The department that issued the "Account sales to consignor" document.
The consignee withholds the commission fee.
The manager who issued the "Account sales to consignor" document.
The user who created "Account sales to consignor" document.
The quantity of goods sold by the consignee.
The customer sales order containing goods sold.
The VAT amount charged on the sales amount in the line.
The purchase order issued for the receipt of goods from the consignor.
The commission amount calculated based on the terms of the consignment contract and the parameters on the "Additional information" tab.
The VAT amount deducted due to the commission fee amount.
The customer that bought the consigned goods.
The date of sale to the customer.
A unique ID for mapping a line of "Inventory" tabular section to a line of "SerialNumbers" tabular section. It is generated automatically and cannot be edited.
Select advances issued to the advance holder.
A unique ID for mapping a line of "Inventory" tabular section to a line of "SerialNumbers" tabular section. It is generated automatically and cannot be edited.
